Instruction: Combine garlic, tomato sauce, tomato paste, parsley, and basil in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and let simmer.

Simmer meatballs in sauce over low heat for four hours after frying them in olive oil until brown. Add the meatballs to a large pot with garlic, tomato sauce, tomato paste, parsley, and basil. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer.
